sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> crashes into the <radical>sun</radical>, which is then caught in a <radical>net</radical> tied to a <radical>stool</radical>! Wait a second... this doesn't sound realistic, this is from that pirate <kanji>manga</kanji> you're always reading!
meaningInfo: Imagine reading this issue of your favorite stretchy pirate boy manga, Lumpy uses his arms as a net, his legs tied to a stool, and traps the sun in a net right as the tsunami hits. Gee what kind of crazy trouble is he getting into this time?!
readingInfo: You already know all about manga and now you can read them too. Look how far you've come. Wow, what a journey. And you're almost at the end. Gosh, I'm just so proud of you, kiddo.
